bibl.title: J.W. Tripp v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Jefferson County Third Judicial District Court

body.p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON }ss Third Judicial District
To the Sheriff of Jefferson County, Greeting:
In the name of the United States of America you are hereby commanded to subpoena William L. Chalmers and that he bring with him his Docket and all papers pertaining to the case herein mentioned

to be and appear forwith before the Judge of the United States District Court for the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, now in ocassion at the Court House in Port Townsend, for District aforesaid, then and there to give evidence in a cause therein pending, wherein J.W. Tripp the territory is Plaintiff, and J.W. Tripp is Defendant.
WITNESS the Honorable Charles B. Darwin, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court and Judge of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, this _____ day of June March A.D. 1867
